tuples.review: The area is surrounded with good Greenary , has local as well as standard Markets. There is a cricket ground and a badminton academy for children. With a school and various parks. There are 2 hospitals in the vicinity. Almost with 5 to 6 thousand families living already in this area. Cab and other transport facilities are easily available.

pointers.title: Sector-120 Noida is a mid-income sector in Central Noida offering ample ready-to-move-in residential apartments
Vikas Marg, FNG Expressway Service Road & Vishwakarma Road make it well connected to other sectors of Central Noida
Sector-120 Noida is 3 km from Sector-52 Metro Station on Delhi Metro's Blue Line, connecting Dwarka & Electronic City
Famous commercial hubs of Sector-62 and 63 are 9 km from Sector-120 Noida, while Artha SEZ is 7 km away only
Industrial units in Sectors 60, 67 and 68 Noida fall within a radius of 6 km from Sector-120 Noida
Proximity to business centres and affordable rentals attract the tenant community to Sector-120 Noida
Connects to two major highways, such as NH-24 and Noida-Greater Noida Expressway, within a radius of 9 km
Renowned builders, such as Prateek Group & Amrapali Group, offer housing supply in Sector-120 Noida at mid-income rates
Top hospitals, such as Tripathi Hospital (1 km), Kailash Hospital (4 km) and Neuro Hospital (4 km), are nearby
Raghav Global School, The Millennium School & Noida International School are 2-3 km from Sector-120 Noida
Prominent shopping destinations, such as Spectrum Metro Mall and Logix City Centre, are 5 km from this sector
Hazrat Nizamuddin Railway Station is 19 km from Sector-120 Noida via Noida Bypass Flyover
Sector-120 Noida is 34 km from IGI Airport via Baba Banda Singh Bahadur Setu
Parthala Chowk, a vital junction for commute, faces severe traffic bottleneck during the peak hours
Faulty sewerage network in some areas of Sector-120 Noida causes an overflow of sewage
Sector 117 Main Road, a key approach road, is prone to waterlogging

tuples.review:
1)Public Transport Facilities are very good for reach at this place, Nearby Metro Station is Noida Sector 59. Ola/Uber taxi is also available at all time. Sharing Auto is also run in this area.
2)Many Schools are located in this Area at walkable distance. Some International Schools are also situated at this place.
3)This Area is very minimal record of crime, becoz all the time Police Patrolling Vehicle run by every 4 hours.
4)Well Maintained Playing Zone in this Area for Children's, Some Parks is also present in this place.
5)Govt. Hospitals and Some Private Multispecialities Hospitals also there within 4 KM area. Such AS- Kailash Multispeciality Hospital is also present in Noida Sec.70.
6)24Ã—7 Electricity Available means No Power Shortage Area.
7)Sector 70 have 2 Petrol Pumps- Indian Oil as well as Bharat Petroleum Petrol Pump also.

pointers.title: Sector-70 Noida is a mid-segment housing hub with a decent supply of apartments and plots
The sector is strategically connected to NE-3, Vikas Marg, and Vishwakarma Road for convenient intracity access
Commercial hubs like Sector-18, 62 and 63 are within a 10 km radius from Sector-70
Residents enjoy the ease of connectivity via Sector-51 Metro Station (4 km away) on the Aqua Line of the Noida Metro
Sector-70 is a preferred rental hub among professionals due to competitive rentals and connectivity to workplaces
Ghaziabad Railway Station is about 14 km from Sector-70 via NE-3
Renowned schools within 4 km include The Millennium, DPS School, Sheffield, and Sanfort Noida
Located about 5 km from Fortis Hospital in Sector-62 via Vishwakarma Road
Marketplaces, such as Asquare Mall and Gaur City Mall, are 2-6 km from the sector
Indira Gandhi International Airport is about 32 km from Sector-70 Noida via Baba Banda Singh Bahadur Setu
Residents of Sector-70 Noida often complain of power outages
Commuters face traffic jams at Parthala Chowk, located about 3 km from the Sector-70
Problems associated with sewer lines are common

tuples.review: Here in sector 104, noida have most decent facilities for households, cafe, shopping mart etc. Area is very rich with people om weekend or evening that make it happening place. This area is nearby to Noida expressway highway which make easy to commute outer to the city.

pointers.title: Sector-104 Noida offers ample 3 BHK and 4 BHK ready apartments in the premium budget segment
Nearness to Noida-Greater Noida Expressway helps residents save commute time
Various employment units operating from Express Trade Tower and Sector-62 Noida are accessible 5-12 km away
NSEZ Metro Station, located on the Aqua Line of the Noida Metro, is within 4 km from Sector-104
Tenants like to rent apartments here owing to extensive road connectivity and employment hubs nearby
Reputed schools, such as Pathways School, Fortune World School, and Somerville International, are within a 5 km radius
Healthcare centres like PrimaCare Super Speciality, Jaypee Hospital, and Shri Om Kashyap Lifeline are within 5 km
Starling Edge Mall and JPS Galleria are shopping hubs available in the locality
Botanic Garden of Indian Republic and Okhla Bird Sanctuary are places to visit nearly 7 km away
The distance to Ghaziabad Railway Station is about 20 km from the sector via Vishwakarma Road
Unscheduled power outages in Sector-104 Noida cause inconvenience to residents
Encroachment issues in several parts of the sector trouble residents
Water supply with high TDS level despite installing water treatment plants in some residential societies

tuples.review: Sector 29 is well connected to other parts of noida, with several bus routes and Noida metro station nearby. This sector has several parks and green spaces, including the Sector 29 park and Sector 29 golf course. This sector is home to several reputable educational institutions, including schools and colleges nearby.

pointers.title: Sector 29 Noida is a premium locale that offers an inventory dominated by ready 3 BHK apartments by city-based builders
Less than a km from Botanical Garden Metro Station, which connects to the Blue and Magenta lines of Delhi Metro
Brahmaputra Market is here, whereas Great India Place Mall and DLF Mall of India are closeby
Key corporate hubs in sectors 62 and 63, Noida, such as Embassy Galaxy & Spring Meadows business parks are within 10 km
Several active industrial belts within 9-11 km, including Okhla Industrial Estate, Patparganj, and Sector 62, Noida
The Noida-Greater Noida Expressway is only 3 km away
Served by Captain Vijyant Thapar Marg, Shaheed Smarak Marg Road, Chameli Marg, and Maharishi Dayanand Marg
Nearest Railway Station is Okhla, which is about 13 km via Delhi Noida Direct Flyway
Competitive rent and robust connectivity to key employment hubs of the city drive high rental demand in this sector
Well-known schools in and near the locale are Lord Mahavira, Army Public, and Vishwa Bharati Public
NMC Superspeciality, Dr Bhimrao Ambedkar Multispeciality, and Max Multi Speciality are some prominent hospitals nearby
Via Mahatma Gandhi Road, Indira Gandhi International Airport is at a distance of 24 km
Popular temples, such as Sri Hanuman Mandir and ISKCON Temple Noida, are within 6 km
Residents face difficulty due to less availability of public transport in parts of Sector 29 Noida
Rampant encroachment by street vendors on public roads and walkways have been reported in several areas of this sector
Open garbage dumping has been reported in some parts of Sector 29 Noida

tuples.review: I am staying in this locality about 10 years and I am very much satisfied to living in this area my office is nearby my home and market facility also good and hospitals are also available in 1km distance and everynight the police are patroling in my area and public transport also good and metro facility are also available .

pointers.title: Sector-143 Noida offers ample supply of 3 BHK residential apartments, followed by lands in the premium budget segment
Proximity to Sector-143 and Sector-142 stations on the Noida Metro's Aqua Line, connecting to Central & Greater Noida
Strategic location along Noida-Greater Noida Expressway provides seamless connectivity to East Delhi & Greater Noida
Advant Navis Business Park and IT parks in Sector-143B & 144 Noida are located next to Sector-143 Noida
Popular corporate companies located in Sector-132, 135 & 142, Noida, along Noida-Greater Noida Expressway, are 8 km away
Competitive rentals and direct access to commercial centres of Noida-Greater Noida Expressway attract the professionals
Good internal connectivity by Abdul Kalam Marg, Gujjar Road and Victory Cross Road
Premium housing supply by key developers such as Gulshan Homz, Logix Group Builders and Sikka Group
The sector offers immediate access to Felix Hospital, while Jaypee and Yatharth Superspecialty hospitals are within 8 km
Close to commercial complexes that offer several restaurants and dining options
Shiv Nadar, Step by Step, Genesis Global and Somerville International schools are within 7 km of Sector-143 Noida
About 40 km from Indira Gandhi International Airport via Noida-Greater Noida Expressway
This developing sector is surrounded by open land parcels, which makes it secluded and unsafe at night
Erratic public transportation facility hampers last mile connectivity in Sector-143 Noida
Residents have to travel at least 20 km to access shopping centres located at DLF Mall of India & Logix City Centre

faqs.question: ✅ How can I search for a PG near me?
faqs.answer: You can easily search for a PG near you by visiting the home page of #99acres.com#. Click on 'Near Me' on the search bar and select 'Rent' in the dropdown menu at the top-left. Next, use filters of your choice.

faqs.question: ✅ Is it better to live in a PG or a flat?
faqs.answer: Generally, PG accommodations are ideal for students and office-goers who remain busy with their academic studies and work. Since these people do not have time to manage all the chores, they prefer PGs that offer food facilities and cleaning services.

properties.DESCRIPTION: Strategically located pg/paying guest in sector 19 noida is available for students and working professionals rent now. This is a spacious sharing room available in your budget. This property is spread over 150 sq.Ft. Super built up area with 5 bedroom(s) with 5 bathrooms & 3 balconies. A separate space for pooja room, study room and servant room is available in this pg. We are offering you the furnished room. It has 1 light, 1 ac, 2 wardrobe, 1 fan, 1 geyser, 1 sofa, 1 washing machine, 1 stove, 1 fridge, 1 water purifier, 1 modular kitchen, 1 chimney, 1 dining table, 1 curtains, 1 exhaust fan and 1 study table. This pg has 1 covered parking & 1 open parking. This accommodation is in 0-1 year old property. You can rent out the room from thu, 22 jun 2023. Available room/bed : 1 room. Rent this pg for 12,000 only, and live in one of the prime locations in the city. Breakfast, dinner will be provided on weekdays and breakfast, lunch, dinner will be provided on weekends. Tenants can have veg only food here. Additionally, the property has partial power back up. This property faces the north-East direction.
